mainConservation.title: The Department of Wildlife Conservation, A Sustainable way forward
mainConservation.description: The Sri Lankan Department of Wildlife Conservation preserves and sustains the nation's biodiversity. Committed to safeguarding flora and fauna, it enforces laws, collaborates for conservation, and promotes awareness.

gallery.title: Minneriya National Park
gallery.description: A picturesque park known for the gathering of elephants during the famous Minneriya Elephant Gathering.

gallery.title: Wilpattu National Park
gallery.description: Wilpattu, the largest national park in Sri Lanka, is renowned for its natural lakes and diverse fauna.

gallery.title: Horton Plains National Park
gallery.description: Discover the scenic beauty and unique flora and fauna of Horton Plains, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
